name: Kalaban
description: Horror-themed action-adventure set in alternate history Finland.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10, 8.x, 7, Vista, XP Processor: 1 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 256 MB graphics card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB graphics card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
